rooms.description: Open-plan space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern facade to maximize natural light and ventilation. Includes wheelchair accessible pathways.
Adjacent to living area; designed for ample space for dining with direct access to the kitchen. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facade enhance ventilation.
Modern, wheelchair accessible layout with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and efficient workflow. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with the east direction.
Designated quiet space located in a corner of the living area for reading and study. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side to minimize direct sunlight while ensuring ample natural light.
Centralized space for laundry, storage, and other service functions. Designed with accessibility in mind.
